code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

pen = turtle.Turtle()
pen.color('white')
pen.speed(0)

pen.penup()
pen.goto(-100,100)

pen.write(0)
pen.right(90)
pen.forward(10)

pen.pendown()
pen.forward(200)
pen.penup()
pen.backward(-210)

guide.img: Let’s continue drawing the race track in this lesson
Put the pen down and move forward by 200 pixels, this will be the start of our race track
guide.code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

pen = turtle.Turtle()
pen.color('white')
pen.speed(0)

pen.penup()
pen.goto(-100,100)

pen.write(0)
pen.right(90)
pen.forward(10)

pen.pendown()
pen.forward(200)

guide.img: Now use penup again, and go back by 210 pixels, going back to the point where we start
guide.code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("green")

pen = turtle.Turtle()
pen.color('white')
pen.speed(0)

pen.penup()
pen.goto(-100,100)

pen.write(0)
pen.right(90)
pen.forward(10)

pen.pendown()
pen.forward(200)
pen.penup()
pen.backward(-210)
